alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Western Mojave Desert (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 18 at 7:18PM PDT until April 19 at 2:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected to continue into the early morning of Wednesday. * WHERE...Western Mojave Desert and Eastern Mojave Desert. * WHEN...Now in effect until 2 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects and visibilities could be reduced due to blowing dust and sand.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mojave Desert, Including the Mojave National Preserve; Western Mojave Desert
